mapper.update:
update ams_stock_category
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stock_category_name = #{stockCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where stock_category_id = #{stockCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ams_stock_category set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stock_category_name = #{stockCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where stock_category_id = #{stockCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ams_stock_category_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from ams_stock_category as tb where stock_category_id= #{stock_category_id}
